title: Metrics shared rna atac
description: Schema for submitting metadata for various processing metrics.

total_cells_detected.title: Total cells detected
total_cells_detected.description: The total number of barcodes identified as cells

frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_genome.title: Fraction of reads mapped confidently to genome
frac_reads_mapped_confidently_to_genome.description: Fraction of reads that mapped confidently to genome

frac_waste_dup.title: Fraction of duplicate read pairs
frac_waste_dup.description: Fraction of all the sequenced read pairs that come from cell barcodes and are deemed to be PCR duplicates due to alignment to the same genomic position as another read pair in the library.
